archimate:Requirement.name: PA.1.2.17a: a) installing and maintaining firewalls (host-based or personal), or equivalent devices, to restrict inbound and outbound network traffic (e.g. to authorised applications such as a web browser or an email client, and to protocols such as HTTP and HTTPS)
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
